mummies were seriously damaged by an out-of-control mob at the Egyptian Museum in Cairo yesterday before civilian volunteers saved the vaunted treasure trove of ancient artifacts from greater damage by forming a human chain around the building. I felt deeply sorry today when I came this morning to the Egyptian Museum and found that someone had tried to raid the museum by force last night, said Zahi Hawass , Egypt's top archeologist and star of The History Channel show`` Chasing Mummies.'' I am enormously proud of my last decade as CEO, and I am certain that the next 10 years under Larry will be even better! Larry, in my clear opinion, is ready to lead.
